reviews.text: I had an amazing experience at Astute Medical Aesthetic, thanks to Tracey and Linda. They made me feel comfortable and well-informed without any pressure to proceed with . There was no hard-selling—just honest advice tailored to what would work best for me. The results speak for themselves, and I couldn’t be happier! If you’re looking for a trustworthy, skilled, and patient-focused aesthetic clinic, I highly recommend Tracey and Linda. The other lady also provide great service but I miss her name. Basically their staffs are well trained.

Highly recommend this clinic and the incredible expertise of Dr. Mark & Ting Ting! From the moment I started my customised treatment journey with them, my skin texture has improved, and each session brings me closer to my skin goals—it’s honestly so satisfying and rewarding to see the results in the mirror!

What truly sets them apart is their honesty, sincerity, and commitment to delivering what’s genuinely best for my skin. Unlike some other bad experiences that push for unnecessary and pricey treatments, they carefully listen to my concerns and only recommend what truly benefits my skin. I appreciate their integrity and the way they tailor each session to target my specific needs without compromising my skin goals.

The experience here is personalized, professional, and results-driven, and I always look forward to coming back and to keep improving after each session. If you’re looking for experts who truly care and deliver real results, I highly recommend Astute, must look for Dr Mark and Ting Ting!

Thank you, Dr. Mark & Ting Ting, for bringing out good improvements in my skin, I look forward to continuing my journey with you! ✨

I have been doing facial and laser treatments at Astute for the past two years and it has been a good experience. The clinics are clean and spacious. The estheticians and doctors are professional and explained every step of the process, making me feel comfortable throughout the treatment. My skin has cleared so much and looks more radiant now :)

Great service at Astute Medical East coast outlet.  i bought face  treatments  , tracy & Linda are experienced and knowledgeable. i also bought some Botox treatments ,Dr Desmond is very gentle with procedure ,he always gives me valuable advice on skin care. I am really impressed with his skills! I highly recommend Astute.

Dr Mark is very attentive and always do a good and thorough job.
Tracy and Linda always give very good advice and inform us  promptly on good deals . Efficient on making appointments.
Summer is a very thoughtful therapist. Will go the extra mile.
